title: Chatting Optimism with OP Labs Co-founder Mark Tyneway

um the market maker is exposed to risk

chain um but they run the risk of the um

that the chain is finalized before they

you can kind of think of them almost
like the way that the same way that
centralized exchanges do
um
crediting and um with the native interop
